case.title: Younger GF Wanted (LONDON)
case.text:
I am 45 I look and fell younger than my age. I am intelegent, reliable, easy going man with a love of finer things in life, champagne, strawberries, laughter, meals out, weekends away, holidays in the sunshine, looking for a younger (over 25) attractive woman to share it all with
Lets Make the Dreams come
